entries.name: Darkvision
entries: U kunt zien in zwak licht binnen 60 voet van u alsof het helder licht is, en in duisternis alsof het zwak licht is. U kunt geen kleur onderscheiden in de duisternis, alleen grijstinten.

entries.name: Rampage
entries: Als je in je beurt een wezen met een mêlee-aanval tot 0 hit points reduceert, kun je een bonusactie uitvoeren om je tot de helft van je snelheid te verplaatsen en een bijtaanval uit te voeren.

entries.name: Age
entries: Kabouters worden even snel volwassen als mensen, en de meeste zullen rond hun veertigste een volwassen leven leiden. Ze kunnen 350 tot bijna 500 jaar oud worden.

entries.name: Size
entries: Kabouters zijn tussen de 2 en 3 meter groot en wegen gemiddeld zo'n 5 kilo. Uw maat is Klein.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: Gewend aan het ondergrondse leven, heb je een superieur zicht in donkere en schemerige omstandigheden. U kunt zien in zwak licht binnen 60 voet van u alsof het helder licht is, en in duisternis alsof het zwak licht is. Je kunt geen kleur onderscheiden in de duisternis, alleen grijstinten.

entries.name: Gnome Cunning
entries: Je hebt voordeel op alle Intelligentie, Wijsheid, en Charisma saving throws tegen magie.

entries.name: Languages
entries: Je kunt gewoon en Gnomisch spreken, lezen en schrijven. De Gnomish taal, die het Dwarvish schrift gebruikt, is bekend om zijn technische verhandelingen en zijn catalogi van kennis over de natuurlijke wereld.

entries.name: Innate Spellcasting
entries: Je hebt een aangeboren vermogen om de volgende spreuken uit te spreken, waarvoor geen materiële componenten nodig zijn:

items.name: At will:
items.entry: {@spell nondetection} (alleen zelf)

items.name: 1/day each:
items.entry: {@spell blindness/deafness}, {@spell blur}, {@spell disguise self}

entries: Intelligentie is je vaardigheid om deze spreuken uit te spreken.

entries.name: Gnome Cunning
entries: Je hebt voordeel op Intelligentie, Wijsheid en Charisma tegen magie.

entries.name: Superior Darkvision
entries: Gewend aan het ondergrondse leven, heb je een superieur zicht in donkere en schemerige omstandigheden. U kunt zien in schemerig licht binnen 120 voet van u alsof het helder licht is, en in duisternis alsof het zwak licht is. Je kunt geen kleur onderscheiden in de duisternis, alleen grijstinten.

entries.name: Languages
entries: Je kunt Gnomisch, Terraans en Undercommon spreken, lezen en schrijven.

entries.name: Nimble Escape
entries: Je kunt de {@action Disengage} of {@action Hide} actie als bonusactie doen op elk van je beurten.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: Gewend aan het ondergrondse leven, heb je een superieur zicht in donkere en schemerige omstandigheden. U kunt zien in zwak licht binnen 60 voet van u alsof het helder licht is, en in duisternis alsof het zwak licht is. Je kunt geen kleur onderscheiden in de duisternis, alleen grijstinten.

entries.name: Languages
entries: U spreekt, leest en schrijft gewoon en Goblin.

items.name: Alignment
entries: In Eberron zijn goblins gewoonlijk neutraal. Ze zijn geneigd voor zichzelf op te komen, bij voorkeur zonder ongewenste aandacht te trekken van grotere, machtigere mensen.

items.name: Size
entries: Uw maat is Small.

items.name: Alignment
entries: Goblins zijn meestal neutraal slecht, omdat zij alleen voor hun eigen behoeften zorgen. Een paar goblins neigen naar goed of neutraliteit, maar slechts zelden.

items.name: Age
entries: Goblins worden volwassen rond de leeftijd van 8 jaar. Zij verouderen merkbaar sneller dan mensen, en hoewel weinig goblins oud worden, leven de meest voorzichtige zelden langer dan 60 jaar.

items.name: Languages
entries: Je kunt Common en Goblin spreken, lezen en schrijven. In Ravnica is Goblin een simplistische taal met een beperkte woordenschat en vloeiende grammaticaregels, ongeschikt voor een verfijnde conversatie.

entries.name: Creature Type
entries: Je bent een Humanoid. Je wordt ook beschouwd als een goblinoid voor elke prerequisite of effect dat vereist dat je een goblinoid bent.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: U kunt zien in zwak licht binnen 60 voet van u alsof het helder licht is en in duisternis alsof het in zwak licht is. U onderscheidt kleuren in die duisternis alleen als grijstinten.

entries.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Je hebt voordeel bij reddingen die je doet om de {@condition charmed} conditie op jezelf te vermijden of te beëindigen.

entries.name: Fury of the Small
entries: Als je een wezen met een aanval of een spreuk beschadigt en het wezen is groter dan jij, dan kun je ervoor zorgen dat de aanval of de spreuk extra schade toebrengt aan het wezen. De extra schade is gelijk aan je bekwaamheidsbonus.

Je kunt deze eigenschap een aantal keren gebruiken gelijk aan je vaardigheidsbonus, waarbij je alle verbruikte keren weer terugkrijgt als je een lange rustpauze hebt genomen, en je kunt hem niet meer dan één keer per beurt gebruiken.

entries.name: Nimble Escape
entries: Je kunt de {@action Disengage} of {@action Hide} actie als bonusactie doen op elk van je beurten.

entries.name: Age
entries: Goblins worden volwassen als ze 8 jaar oud zijn en kunnen 60 jaar oud worden.

entries.name: Size
entries: Goblins zijn tussen de 2 en 3 meter groot en wegen tussen de 2 en 3 kilo. Uw maat is Klein.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: U kunt zien in zwak licht binnen 60 voet van u alsof het helder licht is, en in duisternis alsof het zwak licht is. U kunt geen kleur onderscheiden in de duisternis, alleen grijstinten.

entries.name: Fury of the Small
entries: Als je een wezen beschadigt met een aanval of een spreuk en het wezen is groter dan jij, dan kun je ervoor zorgen dat de aanval of de spreuk extra schade toebrengt aan het wezen. De extra schade is gelijk aan jouw level. Als je deze eigenschap eenmaal gebruikt, kun je hem niet meer gebruiken totdat je een korte of lange rust hebt genomen.

entries.name: Nimble Escape
entries: Je kunt de {@action Disengage} of {@action Hide} actie als bonusactie doen op elk van je beurten.

entries.name: Languages
entries: U spreekt, leest en schrijft gewoon en Goblin.

items.name: Alignment
entries: Dankwood goblins zijn meestal neutraal of neutraal goed, hoewel sommige ondeugende dankwood goblins chaotisch neutraal zijn.

items.name: Speak with Small Beasts
entries: Door middel van geluiden en gebaren kun je eenvoudige ideeën overbrengen met Kleine of kleinere beesten. Dankwood goblins houden van dieren en houden vaak eekhoorns, dassen, konijnen, mollen, spechten, en andere wezens als geliefde huisdieren.

entries.name: Age
entries: Goblins worden sneller volwassen dan mensen, en bereiken de volwassen leeftijd rond hun 12e. Zij worden merkbaar sneller oud, en hoewel weinig goblins oud worden, leven de meest voorzichtige zelden langer dan 50 jaar.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: De meeste kobolden zijn wild chaotisch, zonder voorkeur voor goed of kwaad, maar met een sterke neiging tot ondeugendheid.

entries.name: Size
entries: Goblins zijn gemiddeld 1 meter groot en wegen ongeveer 2,5 kilo. Jouw maat is Klein.

entries.name: Agile Climber
entries: Je hebt een klimsnelheid van 25 voet. Je kunt je klimsnelheid niet gebruiken als je een middelzware of zware bepantsering draagt. (Als je campagne de variantregel voor encumbrance gebruikt, kun je je klimsnelheid niet gebruiken als je encumbered bent).

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: U kunt zien in zwak licht binnen 60 voet van u alsof het helder licht is, en in duisternis alsof het zwak licht is. U kunt geen kleur onderscheiden in de duisternis, alleen grijstinten.

entries.name: Languages
entries: U spreekt, leest en schrijft gewoon Nederlands (als dat in uw campagne bestaat) en Goblin.

entries.name: Age
entries: Goblins worden sneller volwassen dan mensen, rond hun twaalfde jaar. Zij worden ook merkbaar sneller oud dan mensen, en zelfs de meest voorzichtige goblins leven zelden langer dan 50 jaar.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: De meeste goblins zijn wild chaotisch, hoewel zij geen bijzondere neiging tot goed of kwaad hebben.

entries.name: Size
entries: Goblins zijn gemiddeld 1 meter groot en wegen ongeveer 2,5 kilo. Jouw maat is Klein.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: Dankzij je erfenis, heb je een superieur zicht in donkere en schemerige omstandigheden. U kunt zien in schemerig licht binnen 60 voet van u alsof het helder licht is, en in duisternis alsof het zwak licht is. Je kunt geen kleur onderscheiden in de duisternis, alleen grijstinten.

entries.name: Grit
entries: Je hebt weerstand tegen vuurschade en psychische schade. Bovendien, als je geen pantser draagt, is je AC gelijk aan 11 + je Dexterity modifier.

entries.name: Languages
entries: U spreekt, leest en schrijft gewoon en Goblin.

entries.name: Little Giant
entries: Je hebt vaardigheid in de {@skill Athletics} vaardigheid, en je telt als één maat groter bij het bepalen van je draaggewicht en het gewicht dat je kunt duwen, slepen of tillen.

entries.name: Mountain Born
entries: Je hebt weerstand tegen koude schade. Je acclimatiseert ook van nature aan grote hoogtes, zelfs als je er nog nooit geweest bent. Dit omvat hoogtes boven de 20.000 voet.

entries.name: Stone's Endurance
entries: Je kunt bovennatuurlijk putten uit onverzettelijke steen om schade af te weren. Wanneer je schade oploopt, kun je je reactie gebruiken om een {@dice d12} te gooien. Voeg je grondwettelijkheidsfactor toe aan het gerolde getal en verminder de schade met dat totaal.
Je kunt deze eigenschap een aantal keren gebruiken, gelijk aan je vaardigheidsbonus, en je krijgt alle gebruikte keren terug als je een lange rustpauze hebt genomen.

entries.name: Age
entries: Goliaths hebben een levensduur vergelijkbaar met mensen. Ze worden volwassen in hun late tienerjaren en leven gewoonlijk minder dan een eeuw.

entries.name: Size
entries: Goliaths zijn tussen de 7 en 8 voet groot en wegen tussen de 280 en 340 pond. Uw maat is Medium.

entries.name: Natural Athlete
entries: Je hebt vaardigheid in de {@skill Athletics} vaardigheid.

entries.name: Stone's Endurance
entries: Je kunt jezelf focussen om af en toe een verwonding af te weren. Als je schade oploopt, kun je je reactie gebruiken om een {@dice d12} te rollen. Voeg je grondwetmodificator toe aan het gerolde getal en verminder de schade met dat totaal. Nadat je deze eigenschap hebt gebruikt, kun je hem niet meer gebruiken totdat je een korte of lange rust hebt genomen.

entries.name: Powerful Build
entries: U telt als een maat groter bij het bepalen van uw draagvermogen en het gewicht dat u kunt duwen, slepen of tillen.

entries.name: Mountain Born
entries: Je hebt weerstand tegen koude schade. Je bent ook gewend aan grote hoogtes, inclusief hoogtes boven de 20.000 voet.

entries.name: Languages
entries: U spreekt, leest en schrijft gewoon en reusachtig.

entries.name: Blindsight
entries: Je hebt geen ogen, en kan niet {@condition blinded}. Je kunt je omgeving waarnemen binnen een straal van 30 ft., of 10 ft. terwijl je {@condition deafened} bent. Buiten deze radius word je als blind beschouwd.

entries.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: Je hebt voordeel bij wijsheidscontroles ({@skill Perception}) die op gehoor of reuk gebaseerd zijn.

entries.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: Je hebt voordeel op Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks gemaakt om je te verbergen in rotsachtig terrein.

entries.name: Languages
entries: Je kunt Undercommon spreken, lezen en schrijven.

entries.name: Age
entries: Grungs worden in één jaar volwassen, maar kunnen wel 50 jaar oud worden.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: De meeste Grungs zijn wettig, omdat ze zijn opgevoed in een streng kastensysteem. Zij neigen ook naar het kwaad, omdat zij uit een cultuur komen waar sociale vooruitgang zelden voorkomt, en meestal omdat een ander lid van je leger is gestorven en er niemand anders van die kaste is om de vacature in te vullen.

entries.name: Size
entries: Grungs zijn tussen de 2½ en 3½ voet groot en wegen gemiddeld zo'n 30 pond. Uw maat is Small.

entries.name: Arboreal Alertness
entries: Je hebt vaardigheid in de {@skill Perception} vaardigheid.

entries.name: Amphibious
entries: Je kunt lucht en water inademen.

entries.name: Poison Immunity
entries: Je bent immuun voor gifschade en de {@condition poisoned} conditie.

entries.name: Poisonous Skin
entries: Elk wezen dat je vastgrijpt of op een andere manier in direct contact komt met je huid, moet slagen op een DC 12 Grondwetsbezwaren of {@condition poisoned} worden voor 1 minuut. Een {@condition poisoned} wezen dat niet langer in direct contact met je is, kan aan het eind van elke beurt de worp herhalen en het effect op zichzelf beëindigen als hij slaagt.

Je kunt dit gif ook toepassen op een doorborend wapen als onderdeel van een aanval met dat wapen, hoewel het gif anders reageert wanneer je het raakt. Het doelwit moet slagen op een DC 12 Grondwettelijk reddende worp of {@dice 2d4} gifschade oplopen.

entries.name: Standing Leap
entries: Je ver-springen is tot 25 voet en je hoogspringen tot 15 voet, met of zonder vliegende start.

entries.name: Water Dependency
entries: Als je je gedurende een dag niet minstens 1 uur in water onderdompelt, lijdt je aan het eind van die dag een niveau van {@condition exhaustion}. Je kunt alleen herstellen van deze {@condition exhaustion} door magie of door jezelf minstens 1 uur onder te dompelen in water.

entries.name: Languages
entries: Je kunt Grung spreken, lezen en schrijven.

entries.name: Size
entries: Je bent middelgroot of klein. Je kiest de maat als je deze afstamming krijgt.

entries.name: Dexterous Feet
entries: Je kunt de {@action Use an Object} actie als bonusactie uitvoeren.

entries.name: Glide
entries: Als je geen {@condition incapacitated} of zwaar pantser draagt, kun je je huidmembranen uitstrekken en zweven. Als je dat doet, kun je de volgende luchtmanoeuvres uitvoeren:

items: Als je valt, kun je tot 5 voet horizontaal bewegen voor elke 1 voet die je daalt.
Wanneer u schade zou oplopen door een val, kunt u uw reactie gebruiken om de schade van de val tot 0 te reduceren.

entries.name: Age
entries: Half-elfen worden even snel volwassen als mensen en bereiken de volwassen leeftijd rond hun 20ste. Zij leven echter veel langer dan mensen, vaak meer dan 180 jaar.

entries.name: Size
entries: Half-elfen zijn ongeveer even groot als mensen, variërend van 5 tot 6 voet lang. Uw maat is middelgroot.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: Dankzij je elfenbloed heb je een superieur zicht in donkere en schemerige omstandigheden. Je kunt zien in zwak licht binnen 60 voet van je alsof het helder licht is, en in duisternis alsof het zwak licht is. Je kunt geen kleur onderscheiden in de duisternis, alleen grijstinten.

entries.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Je hebt voordeel bij reddingen tegen het zijn {@condition charmed}, en magie kan je niet in slaap brengen.

entries.name: Skill Versatility
entries: Je wordt vaardig in twee vaardigheden naar keuze.

entries.name: Languages
entries: Je kunt gewoon spreken, lezen en schrijven, Elfs, en een extra taal naar keuze.

entries.name: Age
entries: Half-orcs worden iets sneller volwassen dan mensen en zijn rond hun 14e volwassen. Ze worden merkbaar sneller oud en leven zelden langer dan 75 jaar.

entries.name: Size
entries: Half-orcs zijn iets groter en omvangrijker dan mensen, en ze variëren van 1,80 tot ruim 1,80 meter lang. Jouw maat is middelgroot.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: Dankzij je orc-bloed heb je een superieur zicht in donkere en schemerige omstandigheden. Je kunt zien in zwak licht binnen 60 voet van je alsof het helder licht is, en in de duisternis alsof het zwak licht is. Je kunt geen kleur onderscheiden in de duisternis, alleen grijstinten.

entries.name: Menacing
entries: Je behaalt vaardigheid in de {@skill Intimidation} vaardigheid.

entries.name: Relentless Endurance
entries: Als je tot 0 hit points bent gereduceerd, maar nog niet helemaal dood bent, kun je tot 1 hit point terugvallen. Je kunt deze functie pas weer gebruiken als je een lange rustperiode hebt gehad.

entries.name: Savage Attacks
entries: Wanneer je een kritieke treffer scoort met een aanval met een mêlee-wapen, mag je één van de schadedobbelstenen van het wapen één keer extra gooien en optellen bij de extra schade van de kritieke treffer.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Orc. Orc is a harsh, grating language with hard consonants. It has no script of its own but is written in the Dwarvish script.

entries.name: Age
entries: Half-orcs worden iets sneller volwassen dan mensen en zijn rond hun 14e volwassen. Ze worden merkbaar sneller oud en leven zelden langer dan 75 jaar.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Half-orcs inherit a tendency toward chaos from their orc parents and are not strongly inclined toward good. Half-orcs raised among orcs and willing to live out their lives among them are usually evil.

entries.name: Size
entries: Half-orcs zijn iets groter en omvangrijker dan mensen, en ze variëren van 1,80 tot ruim 1,80 meter lang. Jouw maat is middelgroot.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: U kunt zien in zwak licht binnen 60 voet van u alsof het helder licht is, en in duisternis alsof het zwak licht is. U kunt geen kleur onderscheiden in de duisternis, alleen grijstinten.

entries.name: Hunter's Intuition
entries: When you make a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) or Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) check, you can roll a {@dice d4} and add the number rolled to the ability check.

entries.name: Finder's Magic
entries: You can cast the {@spell hunter's mark} spell with this trait. Starting at 3rd level, you can also cast the {@spell locate object} spell with it. Once you cast either spell with this trait, you can't cast that spell with it again until you finish a long rest. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Languages
entries: U spreekt, leest en schrijft gewoon en Goblin.

entries.name: Spells of the Mark
entries: If you have the Spellcasting or the Pact Magic class feature, the spells on the Mark of Finding Spells table are added to the spell list of your spellcasting class.

entries.caption: Mark of Finding Spells
rows: {@spell locate animals or plants}, {@spell locate object}

entries.name: Age
entries: A halfling reaches adulthood at the age of 20 and generally lives into the middle of his or her second century.

entries.name: Size
entries: Halflings average about 3 feet tall and weigh about 40 pounds. Your size is Small.

entries.name: Lucky
entries: When you roll a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

entries.name: Brave
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

entries.name: Halfling Nimbleness
entries: You can move through the space of any creature that is of a size larger than yours.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Halfling. The Halfling language isn't secret, but halflings are loath to share it with others. They write very little, so they don't have a rich body of literature. Their oral tradition, however, is very strong. Almost all halflings speak Common to converse with the people in whose lands they dwell or through which they are traveling.

entries.name: Size
entries: Je bent Medium of Small. U kiest de maat wanneer u deze race kiest.

entries.name: Hare-Trigger
entries: You can add your proficiency bonus to your initiative rolls.

entries.name: Leporine Senses
entries: Je hebt vaardigheid in de {@skill Perception} vaardigheid.

entries.name: Lucky Footwork
entries: When you fail a Dexterity saving throw, you can use your reaction to roll a {@dice d4} and add it to the save, potentially turning the failure into a success. You can't use this reaction if you're {@condition prone} or your speed is 0.

entries.name: Rabbit Hop
entries: As a bonus action, you can jump a number of feet equal to five times your proficiency bonus, without provoking opportunity attacks. You can use this trait only if your speed is greater than 0. You can use it a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Size
entries: Je bent Medium of Small. U kiest de maat wanneer u deze race kiest.

entries.name: Hare-Trigger
entries: You can add your proficiency bonus to your initiative rolls.

entries.name: Leporine Senses
entries: Je hebt vaardigheid in de {@skill Perception} vaardigheid.

entries.name: Lucky Footwork
entries: When you fail a Dexterity saving throw, you can use your reaction to roll a {@dice d4} and add it to the save, potentially turning the failure into a success. You can't use this reaction if you're {@condition prone} or your speed is 0.

entries.name: Rabbit Hop
entries: As a bonus action, you can jump a number of feet equal to five times your proficiency bonus, without provoking opportunity attacks. You can use this trait only if your speed is greater than 0. You can use it a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

items.name: Type:
items.entry: Fey and Humanoid

items.name: Size:
items.entry: Medium of Small (kies wanneer je deze afstamming krijgt)

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: U kunt zien in zwak licht binnen 60 voet van u alsof het helder licht is en in duisternis alsof het zwak licht is.

entries.name: Fey Resilience
entries: Je hebt voordeel bij reddingen die je doet om de {@condition charmed} conditie op jezelf te vermijden of te beëindigen.

entries.name: Hex Magic
entries: You can cast the {@spell disguise self} and {@spell hex} spells with this trait. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells (choose when you gain this lineage). Once you cast either of these spells with this trait, you can't cast that spell with it again until you finish a long rest. You can also cast these spells using any spells slots you have.

entries.name: Magic Token
entries: As an action, you can harmlessly pull out one of your nails, a tooth, or a lock of hair. This token is imbued with magic until you finish a long rest. While the token is imbued in this way, you can use an action to send a telepathic message to the creature holding or carrying the token, as long as you are on the same plane of existence and are within 10 miles of it. The message can contain up to twenty-five words.

In addition, while you are within 10 miles of the token, you can use an action to enter a trance for 1 minute, during which you can see and hear from the token as if you were located where it is. While you are using your senses at the token's location, you are {@condition blinded} and {@condition deafened} in regard to your own surroundings. Afterward, the token is harmlessly destroyed.
Once you create a token using this feature, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest, at which point your missing part regrows.

entries.name: Creature Type
entries: Je bent een Fey.

entries.name: Size
entries: Je bent middelgroot of klein. Je kiest de maat als je deze afstamming krijgt.

entries.name: Ancestral Legacy
entries: Als je een ras met deze afstamming vervangt, kun je de volgende elementen van dat ras behouden: alle vaardigheden die je eraan hebt ontleend en alle klim-, vlieg- of zwemsnelheden die je eraan hebt ontleend.
Als je geen van deze elementen behoudt of je kiest deze afstamming bij het creëren van je karakter, dan krijg je de vaardigheid in twee vaardigheden naar keuze.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: U kunt zien in zwak licht binnen 60 voet van u alsof het helder licht is en in duisternis alsof het zwak licht is. U onderscheidt kleuren in die duisternis als grijstinten.

entries.name: Eerie Token
entries: As a bonus action, you can harmlessly remove a lock of your hair, one of your nails, or one of your teeth. This token is imbued with magic until you finish a long rest. While the token is imbued in this way, you can take these actions:

items.name: Telepathic Message
items.entry: As an action, you can send a telepathic message to the creature holding or carrying the token, as long as you are within 10 miles of it. The message can contain up to twenty-five words.

items.name: Remote Viewing
items.entry: If you are within 10 miles of the token, you can enter a trance as an action. The trance lasts for 1 minute, but it ends early if you dismiss it (no action required) or are {@condition incapacitated}. During this trance, you can see and hear from the token as if you were located where it is. While you are using your senses at the token's location, you are {@condition blinded} and {@condition deafened} in regard to your own surroundings. When the trance ends, the token is harmlessly destroyed.

entries: Once you create a token using this feature, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest, at which point your missing part regrows.

entries.name: Hex Magic
entries: You can cast the {@spell disguise self} and {@spell hex} spells with this trait. Once you cast either of these spells with this trait, you can't cast that spell with it again until you finish a long rest. You can also cast these spells using any spell slots you have.
Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells (choose the ability when you gain this lineage).

entries.name: Becoming a Hag
entries: Hags can undertake a ritual to irreversibly transform a hexblood they created into a new hag, either one of their own kind or that embodies the hexblood's nature. This requires that both the hag and hexblood be in the same place and consent to the lengthy ritual—circumstances most hexbloods shun but might come to accept over the course of centuries. Once a hexblood undergoes this irreversible ritual, they emerge as a hag NPC no longer under the control of the hexblood's player, unless the DM rules otherwise.

entries.name: Martial Advantage
entries: Once per turn, you can deal an extra {@dice 2d6} damage to a creature you hit with a weapon attack if that creature is within 5 ft. of an ally of yours that isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: U kunt zien in zwak licht binnen 60 voet van u alsof het helder licht is, en in duisternis alsof het zwak licht is. U kunt geen kleur onderscheiden in de duisternis, alleen grijstinten.

entries.name: Languages
entries: U spreekt, leest en schrijft gewoon en Goblin.

items.name: Alignment
entries: Hobgoblin society in Eberron is shaped by the ideal of a strict code of honor and rigid martial discipline. Most hobgoblins are lawful, tending toward harsh enforcement of their laws.

items.name: Size
entries: Uw maat is Medium.

entries.name: Creature Type
entries: You are a Humanoid.You are also considered a goblinoid for any prerequisite or effect that requires you to be a goblinoid.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: U kunt zien in zwak licht binnen 60 voet van u alsof het helder licht is en in duisternis alsof het zwak licht is. U onderscheidt kleuren in die duisternis alleen als grijstinten.

entries.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Je hebt voordeel bij reddingen die je doet om de {@condition charmed} conditie op jezelf te vermijden of te beëindigen.

entries.name: Fey Gift
entries: You can use this trait to take the {@action Help} action as a bonus action, and you can do so a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.
Starting at 3rd level, choose one of the options below each time you take the {@action Help} action with this trait:

items.name: Hospitality
items.entry: You and the creature you help each gain a number of temporary hit points equal to {@dice 1d6} plus your proficiency bonus.

items.name: Passage
items.entry: You and the creature you help each increase your walking speeds by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.

items.name: Spite
items.entry: Until the start of your next turn, the first time the creature you help hits a target with an attack roll, that target has disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes within the next minute.

entries.name: Fortune from the Many
entries: If you miss with an attack roll or fail an ability check or a saving throw, you can draw on your bonds of reciprocity to gain a bonus to the roll equal to the number of allies you can see within 30 feet of you (maximum bonus of +3). You can use this trait a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: U kunt zien in zwak licht binnen 60 voet van u alsof het helder licht is en in duisternis alsof het zwak licht is. U onderscheidt kleuren in die duisternis alleen als grijstinten.

entries.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Je hebt voordeel bij reddingen die je doet om de {@condition charmed} conditie op jezelf te vermijden of te beëindigen.

entries.name: Fey Gift
entries: You can use this trait to take the {@action Help} action as a bonus action, and you can do so a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus. You regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.
Starting at 3rd level, choose one of the options below each time you take the {@action Help} action, whether as a bonus action or an action:

items.name: Hospitality
items.entry: You and the target of your {@action Help} action each gain a number of temporary hit points equal to {@dice 1d6} plus your proficiency bonus.

items.name: Passage
items.entry: You and the target of your {@action Help} action each increase your walking speeds by 10 feet until the start of your next turn.

items.name: Spite
items.entry: Until the start of your next turn, the first time you or the target of your {@action Help} action hits a creature with an attack roll, that creature has disadvantage on the next attack roll that it makes within the next minute.

entries.name: Fortune from the Many
entries: If you miss with an attack roll or fail an ability check or a saving throw, you can draw on your bonds of reciprocity to gain a bonus to the roll equal to the number of allies you can see within 30 feet of you (maximum bonus of +5). You can use this trait a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Age
entries: Hobgoblins mature at the same rate as humans and have lifespans similar in length to theirs.

entries.name: Size
entries: Hobgoblins are between 5 and 6 feet tall and weigh between 150 and 200 pounds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: U kunt zien in zwak licht binnen 60 voet van u alsof het helder licht is, en in duisternis alsof het zwak licht is. U kunt geen kleur onderscheiden in de duisternis, alleen grijstinten.

entries.name: Martial Training
entries: You are proficient with two {@filter martial weapons|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=martial weapon} of your choice and with light armor.

entries.name: Saving Face
entries: Hobgoblins are careful not to show weakness in front of their allies, for fear of losing status. If you miss with an attack roll or fail an ability check or a saving throw, you can gain a bonus to the roll equal to the number of allies you can see within 30 feet of you (maximum bonus of +5). Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Languages
entries: U spreekt, leest en schrijft gewoon en Goblin.

entries.name: Age
entries: Humans reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

entries.name: Size
entries: Humans vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and one extra language of your choice. Humans typically learn the languages of other peoples they deal with, including obscure dialects. They are fond of sprinkling their speech with words borrowed from other tongues: Orc curses, Elvish musical expressions, Dwarvish military phrases, and so on.

entries.name: Age
entries: Humans reach adulthood in their late teens. Most human initiates have completed the trials and found a glorious or inglorious death before they turn 30. Viziers can enjoy longer service to their gods, in theory living up to a century.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Humans tend toward no particular alignment. The best and the worst are found among them.

entries.name: Size
entries: Humans vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium

entries.name: Ability Score Increase
entries: Two different ability scores of your choice increase by 1.

entries.name: Skills
entries: Je wordt bekwaam in een vaardigheid naar keuze.

entries.name: Feat
entries: You gain one {@5etools feat|feats.html} of your choice.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and one extra language of your choice.

entries.name: Age
entries: Humans reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Humans tend toward no particular alignment.

entries.name: Size
entries: Humans vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and one extra language of your choice.

entries.name: Age
entries: Humans reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Humans tend toward no particular alignment. The best and the worst are found among them.

entries.name: Size
entries: Humans vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and one extra language of your choice. Or, if your campaign uses the optional rules for languages found in the previous section, your national origin determines your native language: Itzocan for the Sun Empire, Coalition pidgin for the Brazen Coalition, or Vampire for the Legion of Dusk. You still speak one additional language of your choice, and Common if it exists in your campaign.

items.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and one extra language of your choice. Humans typically learn the languages of other peoples they deal with, including obscure dialects. They are fond of sprinkling their speech with words borrowed from other tongues: vampire curses, Elvish musical expressions, merfolk scholarly jargon, and so on.

entries.name: Age
entries: Kalashtar mature and age at the same rate as humans.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: The noble spirit tied to a kalashtar drives it toward lawful and good behavior. Most kalashtar combine strong self-discipline with compassion for all beings, but some kalashtar resist the virtuous influence of their spirit.

entries.name: Size
entries: Uw maat is Medium.

entries.name: Dual Mind
entries: You have advantage on all Wisdom saving throws.

entries.name: Mental Discipline
entries: Je hebt weerstand tegen psychische schade.

entries.name: Mind Link
entries: You can speak telepathically to any creature you can see, provided the creature is within a number of feet of you equal to 10 times your level. You don't need to share a language with the creature for it to understand your telepathic utterances, but the creature must be able to understand at least one language.

When you're using this trait to speak telepathically to a creature, you can use your action to give that creature the ability to speak telepathically with you for 1 hour or until you end this effect as an action. To use this ability, the creature must be able to see you and must be within this trait's range. You can give this ability to only one creature at a time; giving it to a creature takes it away from another creature who has it.

entries.name: Severed from Dreams
entries: Kalashtar sleep, but they don't connect to the plane of dreams as other creatures do. Instead, their minds draw from the memories of their otherworldly spirit while they sleep. As such, you are immune to spells and other magical effects that require you to dream, like {@spell dream}, but not to spells and other magical effects that put you to sleep, like {@spell sleep}.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common, Quori, and one other language of your choice.

entries.name: Age
entries: Kalashtar develop physically at the same rate as humans do and have similar lifespans.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: The noble spirit tied to a kalashtar drives it toward lawful and good behavior. Most kalashtar combine self-discipline with compassion for all sentient beings, but some kalashtar resist the virtuous influence of their spirit.

entries.name: Size
entries: Kalashtar are similar in build to humans, though they are typically a few inches taller. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Dual Mind
entries: When you make a Wisdom saving throw, you can use your reaction to gain advantage on the roll. You can use this trait immediately before or after you roll, but before any of the roll's effects occur.

entries.name: Mental Discipline
entries: Je hebt weerstand tegen psychische schade.

entries.name: Mind Link
entries: You can speak telepathically to any creature you can see within 60 feet of you. You don't need to share a language with the creature for it to understand your telepathic messages, but the creature must be able to understand at least one language or be telepathic itself.

As a bonus action when you're speaking telepathically to a creature, you can give that creature the ability to speak telepathically to you until the start of your next turn. To use this ability, the creature must be within 60 feet of you and able to see you.

entries.name: Psychic Glamour
entries: Choose one of the following skills: {@skill Insight}, {@skill Intimidation}, {@skill Performance}, or {@skill Persuasion}. You have advantage on all ability checks you make with that skill.

entries.name: Severed from Dreams
entries: Kalashtar sleep, but they don't connect to the plane of dreams as other creatures do. Instead, their minds draw from the memories of their otherworldly spirit while they sleep. As such, you are immune to spells and other magical effects that require you to dream, like the dream spell, but not to spells and effects that put you to sleep, like the sleep spell.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common, Quori, and one other language of your choice.

entries.name: Brave
entries: You have advantage on saving throws you make to avoid or end the {@condition frightened} condition on yourself.

entries.name: Kender Ace
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you possess a magical ability to pull an item out of a bag or another container; as a bonus action, you can reach into a container you're carrying and roll on the Kender Aces table to determine what item you pull out. The object glimmers softly and disappears after 1 hour. You can use this bonus action a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

entries.caption: Kender Aces
rows: 1 {@filter simple weapon|items|source=phb|category=basic|type=simple weapon|property=light} of your choice that has the light property
1 item of your choice from the {@table Adventuring Gear|PHB} table in the Player's Handbook. The item must cost no more than 1 gp and weigh no more than 1 lb.
1 random item from the {@item Trinket|PHB|Trinkets} table in the Player's Handbook.
Your choice of a {@item crowbar|PHB} or a {@item grappling hook|PHB}
1 item of your choice from the {@table Tools|PHB} table in the Player's Handbook. The item must cost no more than 10 gp.

entries.name: Taunt
entries: You have a supernatural ability to home in on a creature's emotional raw nerves and craft a taunt that flusters that creature. As a bonus action, you can unleash a barrage of insults at a creature within 60 feet of you that can hear and understand you. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw (DC equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Charisma modifier), or it has disadvantage on attack rolls until the start of your next turn.
You can use this bonus action a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Fearless
entries: You are immune to the {@condition frightened} condition.

entries.name: Kender Curiosity
entries: Thanks to the mystical origin of your people, you gain proficiency with one of the following skills of your choice: {@skill Insight}, {@skill Investigation}, {@skill Sleight of Hand}, {@skill Stealth}, or {@skill Survival}.

entries.name: Taunt
entries: You have an extraordinary ability to fluster creatures. As a bonus action, you can unleash a string of provoking words at a creature within 60 feet of you that can hear and understand you. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or it has disadvantage on attack rolls against targets other than you until the start of your next turn. The DC equals 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma modifier (choose when you select this race).
You can use this bonus action a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Ambusher
entries: In the first round of a combat, you have advantage on attack rolls against any creature who is surprised.

entries.name: Mimicry
entries: You can mimic any sounds you have heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful DC 14 Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can read and write Common and Auran, but you can only speak using your Mimicry trait.

entries.name: Size
entries: Your size is Medium or Small. You choose the size when you select this race.

entries.name: Expert Duplication
entries: When you copy writing or craftwork produced by yourself or someone else, you have advantage on any ability checks you make to produce an exact duplicate.

entries.name: Kenku Recall
entries: Thanks to your supernaturally good memory, you have proficiency in two skills of your choice.

Moreover, when you make an ability check using any skill in which you have proficiency, you can give yourself advantage on the check before rolling the {@dice d20}. You can give yourself advantage in this way a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Mimicry
entries: You can accurately mimic sounds you have heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds you make can tell they are imitations only with a successful Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check against a DC of 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Charisma modifier.

entries.name: Age
entries: Kenku have shorter lifespans than humans. They reach maturity at about 12 years old and can live to 60.

entries.name: Size
entries: Kenku are around 5 feet tall and weigh between 90 and 120 pounds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Expert Forgery
entries: You can duplicate other creatures' handwriting and craftwork. You have advantage on all checks made to produce forgeries or duplicates of existing objects.

entries.name: Kenku Training
entries: You are proficient in your choice of two of the following skills: {@skill Acrobatics}, {@skill Deception}, {@skill Stealth}, and {@skill Sleight of Hand}.

entries.name: Mimicry
entries: You can mimic sounds you have heard, including voices. A creature that hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check opposed by your Charisma ({@skill Deception}) check.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can read and write Common and Auran, but you can only speak using your Mimicry trait.

entries.name: Age
entries: Khenra mature quickly, reaching adulthood in their early teens. Khenra initiates are usually the youngest in a crop, completing the trials by their late teens. Even without a violent death, they rarely live past 60.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most khenra lean toward chaotic alignments. They have no particular inclination toward good or evil.

entries.name: Size
entries: Khenra have similar builds to humans. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Khenra Weapon Training
entries: You have proficiency with the khopesh ({@item longsword|phb}), {@item spear|phb}, and {@item javelin|phb}.

entries.name: Khenra Twins
entries: If your twin is alive and you can see your twin, whenever you roll a 1 on an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll. If your twin is dead (or if you were born without a twin), you can't be {@condition frightened}.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Khenra.

entries.name: Pack Tactics
entries: You have advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of your allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

entries.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: You have disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight when you, the target of your attack, or whatever you are trying to perceive is in direct sunlight.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: Gewend aan het ondergrondse leven, heb je een superieur zicht in donkere en schemerige omstandigheden. U kunt zien in zwak licht binnen 60 voet van u alsof het helder licht is, en in duisternis alsof het zwak licht is. Je kunt geen kleur onderscheiden in de duisternis, alleen grijstinten.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Draconic.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were in dim light. You discern colors in that darkness only as shades of gray.

entries.name: Draconic Cry
entries: As a bonus action, you let out a cry at your enemies within 10 feet of you. Until the start of your next turn, you and your allies have advantage on attack rolls against any of those enemies who could hear you. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Kobold Legacy
entries: Kobold's connections to dragons can manifest in unpredictable ways in an individual kobold. Choose one of the following legacy options for your kobold.

items.name: Craftiness
items.entry: You have proficiency in one of the following skills of your choice: {@skill Arcana}, {@skill Investigation}, {@skill Medicine}, {@skill Sleight of Hand}, or {@skill Survival}.

items.name: Defiance
items.entry: You have advantage on saving throws to avoid or end the {@condition frightened} condition on yourself.

items.name: Draconic Sorcery
items.entry: You know one {@filter cantrip of your choice from the sorcerer spell list|spells|level=0|class=Sorcerer}. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for that cantrip (choose when you select this race).

items.name: Kobold Legacy (Craftiness)
entries: You have proficiency in one of the following skills of your choice: {@skill Arcana}, {@skill Investigation}, {@skill Medicine}, {@skill Sleight of Hand}, or {@skill Survival}.

items.name: Kobold Legacy (Defiance)
entries: You have advantage on saving throws to avoid or end the {@condition frightened} condition on yourself.

items.name: Kobold Legacy (Draconic Sorcery)
entries: You know one {@filter cantrip of your choice from the sorcerer spell list|spells|level=0|class=Sorcerer}. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for that cantrip (choose when you select this race).

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: U kunt zien in zwak licht binnen 60 voet van u alsof het helder licht is en in duisternis alsof het zwak licht is. U onderscheidt kleuren in die duisternis alleen als grijstinten.

entries.name: Draconic Legacy
entries: The kobold connection to dragons can manifest in unpredictable ways in an individual kobold. Choose one of the following legacy options when you select this race:

items: You have advantage on saving throws to avoid or end the {@condition frightened} condition on yourself.

You know one {@filter cantrip of your choice from the sorcerer spell list|spells|level=0|class=Sorcerer}. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for that cantrip (choose when you select this race).

You can make unarmed strikes with your tail. When you hit with it, the strike deals {@dice 1d6} + your Strength modifier bludgeoning damage, instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike.

entries.name: Draconic Roar
entries: As a bonus action, you let out a draconic roar at your enemies within 10 feet of you. Until the end of your next turn, you and your allies have advantage on attack rolls against any of those enemies who could hear the roar. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Age
entries: Kobolds reach adulthood at age 6 and can live up to 120 years but rarely do so.

entries.name: Size
entries: Kobolds are between 2 and 3 feet tall and weigh between 25 and 35 pounds. Your size is Small.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: U kunt zien in zwak licht binnen 60 voet van u alsof het helder licht is, en in duisternis alsof het zwak licht is. U kunt geen kleur onderscheiden in de duisternis, alleen grijstinten.

entries.name: Grovel, Cower, and Beg
entries: As an action on your turn, you can cower pathetically to distract nearby foes. Until the end of your next turn, your allies gain advantage on attack rolls against enemies within 10 feet of you that you can see. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Pack Tactics
entries: You have advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of your allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

entries.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: You have disadvantage on attack rolls and on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight when you, the target of your attack, or whatever you are trying to perceive is in direct sunlight.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Draconic.

entries.name: Age
entries: Kor mature at the same rate as humans and live about as long.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most kor are lawful good, with a strong dedication to community and the traditions of their ancestors.

entries.name: Size
entries: Kor average nearly 6 feet tall, but are much lighter and more slender than humans. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Brave
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

entries.name: Climbing
entries: You also have a climbing speed of 30 feet as long as you are not encumbered or wearing heavy armor.

entries.name: Kor Climbing
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill Athletics} and {@skill Acrobatics} skills.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common, and communicate in the silent speech of the Kor.

entries.name: Lucky
entries: When you roll a 1 on the {@dice d20} for an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

entries.name: Amphibious
entries: Je kunt lucht en water inademen.

entries.name: Otherworldly Perception
entries: You can sense the presence of any creature within 30 feet of you that is {@condition invisible} or on the Ethereal Plane. You can pinpoint such a creature that is moving.

entries.name: Slippery
entries: You have advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

entries.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, you have disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

entries.name: Superior Darkvision
entries: You have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 120 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Languages
entries: Je kunt Undercommon spreken, lezen en schrijven.

entries.name: Age
entries: Leonin mature and age at about the same rate as humans.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Leonin tend toward good alignments. Leonin who are focused on the pride lean toward lawful good.

entries.name: Size
entries: Leonin are typically over 6 feet tall, with some standing over 7 feet. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Claws
entries: Your claws are natural weapons, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with them, you can deal slashing damage equal to {@damage 1d4} + your Strength modifier, instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike.

entries.name: Hunter's Instincts
entries: You have proficiency in one of the following skills of your choice: {@skill Athletics}, {@skill Intimidation}, {@skill Perception}, or {@skill Survival}.

entries.name: Daunting Roar
entries: As a bonus action, you can let out an especially menacing roar. Creatures of your choice within 10 feet of you that can hear you must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} of you until the end of your next turn. The DC of the save equals 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Constitution modifier. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Leonin.

entries.name: Hold Breath
entries: You can hold your breath for up to 15 minutes at a time.

entries.name: Natural Armor
entries: Your scales function as natural armor, granting you a +3 bonus to Armor Class.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Draconic.

entries.name: Speed
entries: Your walking speed is 30 feet, and you have a swimming speed equal to your walking speed.

entries.name: Bite
entries: You have a fanged maw that you can use to make unarmed strikes. When you hit with it, the strike deals {@damage 1d6} + your Strength modifier slashing damage, instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike.

entries.name: Hold Breath
entries: You can hold your breath for up to 15 minutes at a time.

entries.name: Hungry Jaws
entries: You can throw yourself into a feeding frenzy. As a bonus action, you can make a special attack with your Bite. If the attack hits, it deals its normal damage, and you gain temporary hit points equal to your proficiency bonus. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Natural Armor
entries: You have tough, scaly skin. When you aren't wearing armor, your base AC is 13 + Dexterity modifier. You can use your natural armor to determine your AC if the armor you wear would leave you with a lower AC. A shield's benefits apply as normal while you use your natural armor.

entries.name: Nature's Intuition
entries: Thanks to your mystical connection to nature, you gain proficiency with two of the following skills of your choice: {@skill Animal Handling}, {@skill Medicine}, {@skill Nature}, {@skill Perception}, {@skill Stealth}, or {@skill Survival}.

entries.name: Age
entries: Lizardfolk reach maturity around age 14 and rarely live longer than 60 years.

entries.name: Size
entries: Lizardfolk are a little bulkier and taller than humans, and their colorful frills make them appear even larger. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Swim Speed
entries: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

entries.name: Bite
entries: Your fanged maw is a natural weapon, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with it, you deal piercing damage equal to {@dice 1d6} + your Strength modifier, instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike.

entries.name: Cunning Artisan
entries: As part of a short rest, you can harvest bone and hide from a slain beast, construct, dragon, monstrosity, or plant creature of size small or larger to create one of the following items: a {@item shield|phb}, a {@item club|phb}, a {@item javelin|phb}, or {@dice 1d4} {@item dart|phb|darts} or {@item blowgun needle|phb|blowgun needles}. To use this trait, you need a blade, such as a {@item dagger|phb}, or appropriate {@filter artisan's tools|items|source=phb|miscellaneous=mundane|type=artisan's tools}, such as {@item leatherworker's tools|phb}.

entries.name: Hold Breath
entries: You can hold your breath for up to 15 minutes at a time.

entries.name: Hunter's Lore
entries: You gain proficiency with two of the following skills of your choice: {@skill Animal Handling}, {@skill Nature}, {@skill Perception}, {@skill Stealth}, and {@skill Survival}.

entries.name: Natural Armor
entries: You have tough, scaly skin. When you aren't wearing armor, your AC is 13 + your Dexterity modifier. You can use your natural armor to determine your AC if the armor you wear would leave you with a lower AC. A shield's benefits apply as normal while you use your natural armor.

entries.name: Hungry Jaws
entries: In battle, you can throw yourself into a vicious feeding frenzy. As a bonus action, you can make a special attack with your bite. If the attack hits, it deals its normal damage, and you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier (minimum of 1), and you can't use this trait again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Draconic.

entries.name: Age
entries: Locathah mature to adulthood by the age of 10 but have been known to live up to 80 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most locathah are true neutral or have some aspect of neutrality in their alignment. They tend toward good, coming from a culture where compassion for the downtrodden is a commonality.

entries.name: Natural Armor
entries: You have tough, scaly skin. When you aren't wearing armor, your AC is 12 + your Dexterity modifier. You can use your natural armor to determine your AC if the armor you wear would leave you with a lower AC. A shield's benefits apply as normal while you use your natural armor.

entries.name: Observant & Athletic
entries: You have proficiency in the {@skill Athletics} and {@skill Perception} skills.

entries.name: Leviathan Will
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition paralyzed}, {@condition poisoned}, {@condition stunned}, or put to sleep.

entries.name: Limited Amphibiousness
entries: You can breathe air and water, but you need to be submerged at least once every 4 hours to avoid suffocating.

entries.name: Size
entries: Locathah stand between 5 and 6 feet tall and average about 150 pounds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Language
entries: You can speak, read, and write Aquan and Common.

entries.name: Age
entries: Loxodons physically mature at the same rate as humans, but they live about 450 years. They highly value the weight of wisdom and experience and are considered young until they reach the age of 60.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most loxodons are lawful, believing in the value of a peaceful, ordered life. They also tend toward good.

entries.name: Size
entries: Loxodons stand between 7 and 8 feet tall. Their massive bodies weigh between 300 and 400 pounds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Powerful Build
entries: U telt als een maat groter bij het bepalen van uw draagvermogen en het gewicht dat u kunt duwen, slepen of tillen.

entries.name: Loxodon Serenity
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

entries.name: Natural Armor
entries: You have thick, leathery skin. When you aren't wearing armor, your AC is 12 + your Constitution modifier. You can use your natural armor to determine your AC if the armor you wear would leave you with a lower AC. A shield's benefits apply as normal while you use your natural armor.

entries.name: Tip: AC Calculations Don't Stack
entries: When the game gives you more than one way to calculate your Armor Class, you can use only one of them. You choose the one to use. For example, if you have the loxodon's Natural Armor trait and the monk's Unarmored Defense feature, you don't mix them together. Instead, you choose which one determines your AC.

entries.name: Trunk
entries: You can grasp things with your trunk, and you can use it as a snorkel. It has a reach of 5 feet, and it can lift a number of pounds equal to five times your Strength score. You can use it to do the following simple tasks: lift, drop, hold, push, or pull an object or a creature; open or close a door or a container; grapple someone; or make an unarmed strike. Your DM might allow other simple tasks to be added to that list of options.
Your trunk can't wield weapons or shields or do anything that requires manual precision, such as using tools or magic items or performing the somatic components of a spell.

entries.name: Keen Smell
entries: Thanks to your sensitive trunk, you have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}), Wisdom ({@skill Survival}), and Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) checks that involve smell.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Loxodon.

entries.name: Age
entries: Loxodons physically mature at the same rate as humans, but they live about 450 years. They highly value the weight of wisdom and experience and are considered young until they reach the age of 60.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most loxodons are lawful, believing in the value of a peaceful, ordered life. They also tend toward good.

entries.name: Size
entries: Loxodons stand between 7 and 8 feet tall. Their massive bodies weigh between 300 and 400 pounds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Powerful Build
entries: U telt als een maat groter bij het bepalen van uw draagvermogen en het gewicht dat u kunt duwen, slepen of tillen.

entries.name: Loxodon Bravery
entries: You have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

entries.name: Natural Armor
entries: You have thick, leathery skin. When you aren't wearing armor, your AC is 13 + your Dexterity modifier. You can use your natural armor to determine your AC if the armor you wear would leave you with a lower AC. A shield's benefits apply as normal while you use your natural armor.

entries.name: Tip: AC Calculations Don't Stack
entries: When the game gives you more than one way to calculate your Armor Class, you can use only one of them. You choose the one to use. For example, if you have the loxodon's Natural Armor trait and the monk's Unarmored Defense feature, you don't mix them together. Instead, you choose which one determines your AC.

entries.name: Mason's Proficiency
entries: You gain proficiency with {@item mason's tools|phb}.

entries.name: Stonecunning
entries: Whenever you make an Intelligence ({@skill History}) check related to the origin of stonework, you are considered proficient in the {@skill History} skill and add double your normal proficiency bonus to the check, instead of your normal proficiency bonus.

entries.name: Keen Smell
entries: Thanks to your sensitive trunk, you have advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) and Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) checks that rely on smell.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common.

entries.name: Amphibious
entries: Je kunt lucht en water inademen.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Aquan.

entries.name: Age
entries: Merfolk mature at the same rate humans do and reach adulthood around the age of 20. They live considerably longer than humans, though, often reaching well over 100 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most merfolk are neutral, living in close harmony with nature.

entries.name: Size
entries: Merfolk are significantly taller than most humans, standing between seven and eight feet tall and averaging about 300 pounds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Amphibious
entries: Je kunt lucht en water inademen.

entries.name: Swimming
entries: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common (if it exists in your campaign), Merfolk, and one additional language of your choice.

entries.name: Age
entries: Merfolk mature at the same rate humans do and reach adulthood around the age of 20. They live considerably longer than humans, though, often reaching well over 100 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most merfolk are neutral, though merfolk of the Emeria and Cosi creeds have chaotic leanings.

entries.name: Amphibious
entries: Je kunt lucht en water inademen.

entries.name: Size
entries: Merfolk are about the same size and build as humans. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Swimming
entries: You have a swimming speed of 30 feet.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common, Merfolk, and one extra language of your choice.
{@note These traits are also suitable for minotaurs in other D&D worlds where these people have avoided the demonic influence of Baphomet.}

entries.name: Age
entries: Minotaurs enter adulthood at around the age of 17 and can live up to 150 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most minotaurs who join the Boros Legion lean toward lawful alignments, while those associated with the Cult of Rakdos or the Gruul Clans tend toward chaotic alignments.

entries.name: Size
entries: Minotaurs average over 6 feet in height, and they have stocky builds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Horns
entries: Your horns are natural melee weapons, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with them, you deal piercing damage equal to {@dice 1d6} + your Strength modifier, instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike.

entries.name: Goring Rush
entries: Immediately after you use the {@action Dash} action on your turn and move at least 20 feet, you can make one melee attack with your horns as a bonus action.

entries.name: Hammering Horns
entries: Immediately after you hit a creature with a melee attack as part of the {@action Attack} action on your turn, you can use a bonus action to attempt to shove that target with your horns. The target must be no more than one size larger than you and within 5 feet of you. Unless it succeeds on a Strength saving throw against a DC equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Strength modifier, you push it up to 10 feet away from you.

entries.name: Imposing Presence
entries: You have proficiency in one of the following skills of your choice: {@skill Intimidation} or {@skill Persuasion}.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Minotaur.

items.name: Age
entries: Minotaurs mature and age at about the same rate as humans.

items.name: Alignment
entries: Minotaurs who leave the walls of Skophos have the opportunity to be free of its culture and pursue chaotic alignments, while those who remain within the polis and its tyrannical regime tend toward lawful alignments.

entries.name: Horns
entries: You have horns that you can use to make unarmed strikes. When you hit with them, the strike deals {@damage 1d6} + your Strength modifier piercing damage, instead of the bludgeoning damage normal for an unarmed strike.

entries.name: Goring Rush
entries: Immediately after you take the {@action Dash} action on your turn and move at least 20 feet, you can make one melee attack with your Horns as a bonus action.

entries.name: Hammering Horns
entries: Immediately after you hit a creature with a melee attack as part of the {@action Attack} action on your turn, you can use a bonus action to attempt to push that target with your horns. The target must be within 5 feet of you and no more than one size larger than you. Unless it succeeds on a Strength saving throw against a DC equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Strength modifier, you can push it up to 10 feet away from you.

entries.name: Labyrinthine Recall
entries: You always know which direction is north, and you have advantage on any Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) check you make to navigate or track.

{@note In 2015, minotaurs appeared as a playtest option in Unearthed Arcana. Here is a revised set of traits for minotaur player characters. These traits are suitable for minotaurs on Krynn and in other D&D worlds where these people have avoided the demonic influence of Baphomet.}

entries.name: Age
entries: Minotaurs enter adulthood at around the age of 17 and can live up to 150 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most minotaurs lean toward lawful alignments.

entries.name: Size
entries: Minotaurs average over 6 feet in height, and they have strong, stocky builds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Horns
entries: Your horns are natural melee weapons, with which you're proficient. When you hit with them, the target takes piercing damage equal to {@dice 1d6} + your Strength modifier.

entries.name: Goring Rush
entries: Immediately after you use the {@action Dash} action on your turn and move at least as far as your speed, you can make one melee attack with your horns as a bonus action.

entries.name: Hammering Horns
entries: Immediately after you hit a creature with a melee attack as part of the {@action Attack} action on your turn, you can attempt to shove that creature with your horns using your reaction. The creature must be no more than one size larger than you and within 5 feet of you. It must make a Strength saving throw against a DC equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Strength modifier. If it fails, you push it up to 5 feet away from you.

entries.name: Menacing
entries: Je hebt vaardigheid in de {@skill Intimidation} vaardigheid.

entries.name: Hybrid Nature
entries: Je hebt twee creature types: humanoid en monstrosity. Je kunt worden beïnvloed door een speleffect als het werkt op een van je wezentypes.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Minotaur.

entries.name: Age
entries: Minotaurs develop more slowly than humans, reaching full maturity around the age of 20. They typically become acolytes at around 8 or 9 years old, making them among the older members of their crops. Once they reach maturity, though, minotaurs age quickly, rushing headlong through the trials (as they do all aspects of life) to complete them before they pass their peak. A minotaur allowed to die of old age would rarely live beyond 40.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most minotaurs lean toward chaotic alignments, and they have a slight inclination toward evil.

entries.name: Size
entries: Minotaurs average over 6 feet in height, and they have strong, stocky builds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Natural Weapon
entries: You can use your horns as a natural weapon to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with your horns, you deal bludgeoning damage equal to {@dice 1d6} + your Strength modifier.

entries.name: Menacing
entries: Je behaalt vaardigheid in de {@skill Intimidation} vaardigheid.

entries.name: Relentless Endurance
entries: Als je tot 0 hit points bent gereduceerd, maar nog niet helemaal dood bent, kun je tot 1 hit point terugvallen. Je kunt deze functie pas weer gebruiken als je een lange rustperiode hebt gehad.

entries.name: Savage Attacks
entries: Wanneer je een kritieke treffer scoort met een aanval met een mêlee-wapen, mag je één van de schadedobbelstenen van het wapen één keer extra gooien en optellen bij de extra schade van de kritieke treffer.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Minotaur.

entries.name: Age
entries: Minotaurs enter adulthood at around the age of 17 and can live up to 150 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Minotaurs believe in a strict code of honor, and thus tend toward law. They are loyal to the death and make implacable enemies, even as their brutal culture and disdain for weakness push them toward evil.

entries.name: Size
entries: Minotaurs typically stand well over 6 feet tall and weigh an average of 300 pounds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Conqueror's Virtue
entries: From a young age, you focused on one of the three virtues of strength, cunning, or intellect. Your choice of your Strength, Intelligence, or Wisdom score increases by 1.

entries.name: Horns
entries: You are never unarmed. You are proficient with your horns, which are a melee weapon that deals {@dice 1d10} piercing damage. Your horns grant you advantage on all checks made to shove a creature, but not to avoid being shoved yourself.

entries.name: Goring Rush
entries: When you use the {@action Dash} action during your turn, you can make a melee attack with your horns as a bonus action.

entries.name: Hammering Horns
entries: When you use the {@action Attack} action during your turn to make a melee attack, you can attempt to shove a creature with your horns as a bonus action. You cannot use this shove attempt to knock a creature {@condition prone}.

entries.name: Labyrinthine Recall
entries: You can perfectly recall any path you have traveled.

entries.name: Sea Reaver
entries: You gain proficiency with {@item navigator's tools|phb} and {@filter vehicles (water)|items|source=phb;dmg|miscellaneous=mundane|type=vehicle (water)}.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common.

entries.name: Age
entries: Like humans, naga reach adulthood in their late teens. They show no signs of aging beyond that point except for growing larger, so in theory, a naga could live well over a century.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most naga are either neutral or neutral evil in alignment.

entries.name: Size
entries: Naga stand about 5 feet tall when upright, but the total length of their bodies, head to tail, ranges from 10 to as much as 20 feet. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Speed Burst
entries: By lowering your body to the ground and propelling yourself with your arms, you can move more quickly for a time. As a bonus action on your turn, if you have both hands free, you can increase your walking speed by 5 feet until the end of your turn.

entries.name: Natural Weapons
entries: Your fanged maw and constricting serpentine body are natural weapons, which you can use to make unarmed strikes.

If you hit with your bite, you deal piercing damage equal to {@damage 1d4} + your Strength modifier, and your target must make a Constitution saving throw (DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Constitution modifier). On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 1d4} poison damage.

If you hit with your constrict attack, you deal bludgeoning damage equal to {@dice 1d6} + your Strength modifier, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Strength modifier). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and you can't constrict another target.

entries.name: Poison Immunity
entries: You are immune to poison damage and can't be {@condition poisoned}.

entries.name: Poison Affinity
entries: You gain proficiency with the {@item poisoner's kit|phb}.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Naga.

entries.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, you can move up to your speed toward a hostile creature that you can see.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: Gewend aan het ondergrondse leven, heb je een superieur zicht in donkere en schemerige omstandigheden. U kunt zien in zwak licht binnen 60 voet van u alsof het helder licht is, en in duisternis alsof het zwak licht is. Je kunt geen kleur onderscheiden in de duisternis, alleen grijstinten.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Orc.

items.name: Age
entries: Orcs reach adulthood at age 16, and live up to 80 years.

items.name: Alignment
entries: Orcs fear the curse of ruin that is said to plague their race, and tend strongly toward either chaos (accepting their fate), or toward law (rejecting it).

items.name: Size
entries: Orcs stand easily 8 feet tall and corded with powerful muscles, weighing up to 280 pounds. Your size is Medium.

items.name: Primal Intuition
entries: You have proficiency in two of the following skills of your choice: {@skill Animal Handling}, {@skill Insight}, {@skill Intimidation}, {@skill Medicine}, {@skill Perception}, and {@skill Survival}.

entries.name: Age
entries: Orcs reach adulthood at age 12 and live up to 50 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: The orcs of Eberron are a passionate people, given to powerful emotion and deep faith. They are generally chaotic, but can be any alignment.

entries.name: Size
entries: Uw maat is Medium.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: U kunt zien in zwak licht binnen 60 voet van u alsof het helder licht is, en in duisternis alsof het zwak licht is. U kunt geen kleur onderscheiden in de duisternis, alleen grijstinten.

entries.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, you can move up to your movement speed toward a hostile creature you can see or hear. You must end this move closer to the enemy than you started.

entries.name: Primal Intuition
entries: You have proficiency in two of the following skills of your choice: {@skill Animal Handling}, {@skill Insight}, {@skill Intimidation}, {@skill Medicine}, {@skill Nature}, {@skill Perception}, and {@skill Survival}.

entries.name: Powerful Build
entries: U telt als een maat groter bij het bepalen van uw draagvermogen en het gewicht dat u kunt duwen, slepen of tillen.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read, and write Common and Orc.

entries.name: Adrenaline Rush
entries: You can take the {@action Dash} action as a bonus action. You can use this trait a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a long rest.
Whenever you use this trait, you gain a number of temporary hit points equal to your proficiency bonus.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You discern colors in that darkness only as shades of gray.

entries.name: Powerful Build
entries: U telt als een maat groter bij het bepalen van uw draagvermogen en het gewicht dat u kunt duwen, slepen of tillen.

entries.name: Relentless Endurance
entries: When you are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 hit point instead. Once you use this trait, you can't do so again until you finish a long rest.

entries.name: Age
entries: Orcs reach adulthood at age 12 and live up to 50 years.

entries.name: Size
entries: Orcs are usually over 6 feet tall and weigh between 230 and 280 pounds. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: U kunt zien in zwak licht binnen 60 voet van u alsof het helder licht is, en in duisternis alsof het zwak licht is. U kunt geen kleur onderscheiden in de duisternis, alleen grijstinten.

entries.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, you can move up to your movement speed toward a hostile creature you can see or hear. You must end this move closer to the enemy than you started.

entries.name: Primal Intuition
